## Vector

#### Row vector, 1 × n-matrix

<div class="column-left">
```{r}
x <- 1:3
x
```
</div>
<div class="column-right">
```{julia}
x = [1 2 3];
x
```
</div>

#### Column vector, m × 1-matrix
<div class="column-left">
```{r}
x <- t(1:3)
x
```
</div>
<div class="column-right">
```{julia}
x = [1 2 3]';
x
```
</div>


## String
<div class="column-left">
```{r}
x <- "Hello, R"
x
```
</div>
<div class="column-right">
```{julia}
x = "Hello, Julia";
x
```
</div>
